parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Water Ingress and Comfort System Control Module (CCM) Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Water ingress into the rear left side compartment can cause the CCM to fail, leading to a cascade of errors, including rear light failure, which is a significant safety hazard.
symptoms: Water accumulation in the rear left side compartment
tire well
and rear right side compartment; CCM error; rear lights not working; parking brake light flashing.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The backup camera defaulting to a black graphic view can cause accidents or near-misses while backing up, especially in parking lots.
symptoms: Backup camera displays a black graphic view instead of the camera image; requires manual switching to camera view after every start.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column can cause a loss of steering control, making it difficult to drive the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or increase the risk of a crash.
symptoms: Squeaking or creaking noise from the steering column when steering left or right
steering wheel becomes misaligned
"Steering Malfunction" warning light appears on the dashboard
difficulty driving the vehicle due to steering issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the steering system can cause a loss of steering control, making it difficult to drive the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or increase the risk of a crash.
symptoms: "Steering Malfunction" warning light appears on the dashboard
steering wheel becomes misaligned
difficulty driving the vehicle due to steering issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Erroneous Forward Collision Warning System Activation
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended activation of the Forward Collision Warning system can cause the vehicle to suddenly brake, leading to loss of control, accidents, or injuries to occupants.
symptoms: The Forward Collision Warning system activates without warning
causing the vehicle to rapidly slow down or come to an abrupt stop
even when there is no apparent hazard or obstacle; the system may activate while driving at various speeds
including highway speeds; no warning or indication of malfunction is provided prior to or following the event.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unexpected shattering of the sunroof can cause a loud noise, potentially startling the driver, and may lead to injuries or accidents if the broken glass enters the vehicle's interior.
symptoms: Sudden loud "pop" noise
sunroof pane shattering without warning
glass fragments held in place by aftermarket tint or mesh shade.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: MMI Software Defect - Parking Aid Mode
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The software defect in the parking aid system can cause a distraction while driving, potentially leading to accidents or near-misses, especially when parking in traffic.
symptoms: Top view mode reverts to "graphic view" after each restart
requiring the driver to take their eyes off the road to switch to "camera view"
which can be a distraction and safety risk.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the stop/start system can cause the vehicle to stall while rolling to a stop, increasing the risk of accidents, especially when stopped at intersections or on busy highways.
symptoms: The vehicle dies while rolling to a stop
reports a malfunction
and requires multiple attempts to restart.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pressure sensor can cause the stop/start system to malfunction, leading to unexpected stalling and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle dies while rolling to a stop
reports a malfunction
and requires multiple attempts to restart.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the oil level sensor can cause incorrect oil level readings, potentially leading to engine damage or failure if not addressed.
symptoms: The vehicle displays "PLEASE REDUCE OIL LEVEL" message
despite the oil level being within the recommended range.
